item.title: What Is Your Tent or Rain Jacket Made From? (2025): Dyneema, Silpoly, X-Pac
item.description: Outdoor gear is made from the most high-tech fabric in the world. We explain how Dyneema, silpoly, and X-Pac keep you dry in the wilderness.

item.title: Broadcast TV Is a 'Melting Ice Cube.’ Kimmel Just Turned Up the Heat
item.description: After Sinclair and Nexstar pulled Jimmy Kimmel off air, the old affiliate model looks shakier than ever. Even Disney might do better without broadcast...

item.title: The Trump admin is going after semiconductor imports
item.description: The Trump administration wants the industry to reach a 1:1 ratio of domestically produced and imported chips.

item.title: The Best 3-in-1 Apple Charging Stations (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods topped up with these WIRED-tested docking systems.

item.title: 17 Best Air Purifiers (2025): Coway, AirDoctor, IQAir
item.description: Protect your home against dust, pets, allergies, and more with air purifiers tested firsthand by WIRED.
